legalHoldActivated: This conversation is under legal hold
legalHoldDeactivated: Legal hold deactivated for this conversation
legalHoldDescriptionOthers:
Legal Hold has been activated for at least one person in this conversation.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
legalHoldDescriptionSelf:
Legal Hold has been activated for your account.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
Your conversation partners will be aware of the recording.
legalHoldMessageSendingMissingConsentMes: You cannot send this message because you have at least one outdated device that does not support legal hold. Please update all your devices or remove them from the app settings. [link]Learn more[/link]
legalHoldModalText: All future messages will be recorded by the device with fingerprint:[br][fingerprint][br]This includes deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages in all conversations.
legalHoldWarningMessage: The conversation is now subject to legal hold.[br]Do you still want to send your message?

messageDetailsNoLikes: No one has liked this message yet.
messageDetailsNoReceipts: No one has read this message yet.
messageDetailsReceiptsOff: Read receipts were not on when this message was sent.
mlsToggleInfo: When this is on, conversation will use the new messaging layer security (MLS) protocol.
modalAccountCreateMessage: By creating an account you will lose the conversation history in this guest room.
modalAccountDeletionMessage: 我們將透過電子郵件或手機簡訊發送連結給您。請點擊連結來永久刪除您的帳號。
modalAccountLeaveGuestRoomMessage: Conversation history will be deleted. To keep it, create an account next time.
modalAccountLogoutOption: 從此設備中刪除所有您的個人資料以及對話內容。

modalAccountReadReceiptsChangedMessage: You can change this option in your account settings.
modalAccountRemoveDeviceMessage: 需要輸入您的密碼以進行設備移除。
modalAppLockForgotMessage: The data stored on this device can only be accessed with your app lock passphrase. If you have forgotten your passphrase, you can reset this client.
modalAppLockSetupChangeMessage: Your organization needs to lock your app when {{brandName}} is not in use to keep the team safe.[br]Create a passlock to unlock {{brandName}}. Please, remember it, as it can not be recovered.
modalAppLockSetupMessage: The app will lock itself after a certain time of inactivity.[br]To unlock the app you need to enter this passphrase.[br]Make sure to remember this passphrase as there is no way to recover it.
modalAppLockWipeConfirmMessage: All your conversation history will be permanently deleted from this client. You may then log in again.
modalAppLockWipeConfirmTitle: Do you really want to reset this client?
modalAppLockWipePasswordTitle: Enter your {{brandName}} account password to reset this client

modalAssetParallelUploadsMessage: 您一次最多可以傳送 {{number}} 個檔案。
modalAssetTooLargeMessage: 您可以發送的檔案最大是 {{number}} 。
modalAvailabilityAvailableMessage: You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalAvailabilityAwayMessage: You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
modalAvailabilityBusyMessage: You will appear as Busy to other people. You will only receive notifications for mentions, replies, and calls in conversations that are not muted.
modalAvailabilityDontShowAgain: Do not display this information again
modalAvailabilityNoneMessage: You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalCallEmptyLogMessage: There were no calls to base the debug report on.

participantDevicesDetailHeadline: 請確認此指紋碼與 [bold]{{user}} 的 [/bold] 裝置上的指紋碼相互吻合。

participantDevicesHeadline: {{brandName}} 會為每個設備產生一個獨一無二的指紋碼，請與 {{user}} 核對該指紋碼並驗證您的對話。

preferencesAVNoCamera: {{brandName}} doesn’t have access to the camera.[br][faqLink]Read this support article[/faqLink] to find out how to fix it.
preferencesAVTemporaryDisclaimer: Guests can’t start video conferences. Select the camera to use if you join one.
preferencesAccountAppLockDetail: Lock Wire after {{locktime}} in the background. Unlock with Touch ID or enter your passcode.
preferencesAccountDataDetail: Send anonymous crash reports and basic data like version number and operating system to help {{brandName}} identify and solve issues in the app.
preferencesAccountDataTelemetry: Usage data allows {{brandName}} to understand how the app is being used and how it can be improved. The data is anonymous and does not include the content of your communications (such as messages, files or calls).
preferencesAccountLeaveGuestRoomDescript: You will no longer be able to access the messages in this conversation.
preferencesAccountMarketingConsentDetail: Receive news and product updates from {{brandName}} via email.
preferencesAccountReadReceiptsDetail: When this is off, you won’t be able to see read receipts from other people. This setting does not apply to group conversations.
preferencesAccountUsernameHint: 至少要兩個字元，只可使用 a 到 z、0 到 9 或者 _ 這些字元。
preferencesDevicesActiveDetail: 如果您不認得上面的設備，請將它移除並且重設您的密碼。
preferencesDevicesFingerprintDetail: {{brandName}} 會為每個不同的設備產生獨一無二的指紋碼供識別，請詳細比對並驗證您的設備以及對話。
preferencesDevicesRemoveDetail: 如果您已經不再使用此設備的話，請把它移除，此設備將會被立即登出您的帳號。
preferencesDevicesSessionDetail: 如果設備指紋碼比對後發現有出入，請重新啟動 session 以便使對話的雙方皆產產生一組新的加密金鑰。
preferencesOptionsBackupExportSecondary:
Create a backup to preserve your conversation history. You can use this to restore history if you lose your computer or switch to a new one.
The backup file is not protected by {{brandName}} end-to-end encryption, so store it in a safe place.
preferencesOptionsBackupImportSecondary: You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform. Your backup will overwrite the conversations that you may have on this device.
preferencesOptionsCallLogsDetail: This information helps {{brandName}} Support diagnose calling problems.
preferencesOptionsContactsDetail: 我們使用您的通訊錄來幫助您與其他人連上線，我們會將一切資訊匿名化並且不會與任何人分享。
preferencesOptionsEmojiReplaceCheckbox: 用 emojis 替換表情圖示
preferencesOptionsEnableAgcDetails: Enable to allow your microphone volume to be adjusted automatically to ensure all participants in a call are heard with similar and comfortable loudness.
preferencesOptionsEnableSoundlessIncomin: Enable to silence incoming calls when you are already in an ongoing call.
preferencesOptionsEnableVbrDetails: This makes audio calls use less data and work better on slower networks. Turn off to use constant bitrate encoding (CBR). This setting only affects 1:1 calls; conference calls always use CBR encoding.
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendCheckbox: 為您發送的網路連結產生預覽
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendDetail: 其他人發送的網路連結可能仍然會顯示預覽
readReceiptsToggleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
receiptToggleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
searchFederatedDomainNotAvailable: The federated domain is currently not available.
searchInvite: 邀請好友加入 {{brandName}} 的行列
searchInviteDetail: 分享您的通訊錄可以幫助您聯絡上其他人，我們會把所有資訊匿名化，並且也不會跟其他人分享這些資訊。
searchListEveryoneParticipates: 您所有的連絡人都已在此對話群組中。
searchListNoMatches:
沒有符合的結果。
請試試別的名稱。
searchMemberInvite: Invite people to join the team
searchNoContactsOnWire:
您在 {{brandName}} 裡沒有聯絡人。
請試著依照使用者名稱或別名來尋找。
searchNoServicesManager: Services are helpers that can improve your workflow.
searchNoServicesMember: Services are helpers that can improve your workflow. To enable them, ask your administrator.
searchPlaceholder: 依照使用者名稱或別名來搜尋
searchTrySearch: 依照使用者名稱或別名來找人
searchTrySearchFederation:

@username

Find people from another domain
by @username@domainname
servicesRoomToggleInfoExtended: Open this conversation to services. You can always change it later.
setEmail.headline: Set email
setEntropy.headline: Create Entropy
setEntropy.moreEntropyNeeded: Please continue moving your mouse within the window to create enough entropy.
setEntropy.subheadline: Move your mouse as randomly as possible within the window below until the progress bar is 100% filled. This creates a random number which helps to protect your account and increases the overall security.
setPassword.headline: Set password
ssoLogin.headline: Company log in
ssoLogin.overlayDescription: If you don't see the Single Sign On window, continue your Company Log in from here.
ssoLogin.subhead: Enter the company SSO access code.
ssoLogin.subheadCodeOrEmail: Please enter your email or SSO code.
ssoLogin.subheadEmailEnvironmentSwitchWa: If your email matches an enterprise installation of {brandName}, this app will connect to that server.
takeoverSub: 在 {{brandName}} 上選取一個您獨有的名稱。
teamName.headline: Name your team
teamName.subhead: You can always change it later.
temporaryGuestDescription: Secure your business with encrypted group messaging and conference calls.
temporaryGuestJoinDescription: If you close or refresh this page, you will lose access.
temporaryGuestJoinMessage: This conversation will be available to you for 24 hours.
temporaryGuestLeaveDescription: If you close or refresh this page, you will lose access to the conversation history.
temporaryGuestLeaveMessage: You are no longer part of this conversation.
timedMessageDisclaimer: Self-deleting messages will be turned on for all the participants in this conversation.
tooltipConversationAllVerified: 所有的指紋碼皆已驗證完成

unsupported.headlineIndexedDb: Your browser is in private mode
unsupported.subheadBrowser: Download the latest version of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera or Microsoft Edge.
unsupported.subheadCookies: Enable cookies to log in to {brandName}.
unsupported.subheadIndexedDb: {brandName} needs access to local storage to display your messages. Local storage is not available in private mode.
userNotFoundMessage: You may not have permission with this account or the person may not be on {{brandName}}.

warningCallUnsupportedIncoming: {{user}} 正在呼叫您，但是您的瀏覽器不支援對話功能。
warningCallUnsupportedOutgoing: 因為您的瀏覽器不支援通話功能，因此您無法進行對話。
warningCallUpgradeBrowser: 來發起通話，請更新您的 Google Chrome 瀏覽器。
warningConnectivityConnectionLost: 正在嘗試連線中，此時 {{brandName}} 可能無法傳送訊息。
warningConnectivityNoInternet: 沒有網路連線，您將無法傳送或接收訊息。
warningLifecycleUpdate: 有新版的 {{brandName}} 可供下載更新了。
warningNotFoundCamera: 因為您的電腦沒有攝影機，所以無法發起通話。
warningNotFoundMicrophone: 因為您的電腦沒有麥克風，所以無法發起通話。
warningPermissionDeniedCamera: 由於您的瀏覽器沒有存取攝影機的權限，所以無法發起通話。
warningPermissionDeniedMicrophone: 由於您的瀏覽器沒有存取麥克風的權限，所以無法發起通話。
warningPermissionDeniedScreen: 您的瀏覽器必須要取得許可才能分享您的螢幕畫面。
